name: Deliverables
author: The Right Software

sections.description:
Setup online shop without WooCommerce or other eCommerce plugins. Deliverables is a plugin used for online item delivery.
User can add the item, category and unit by choosing its quantity and option of packing. The list of item will be saved in PDF for the business offering delivery service under order module. Can be used for groceries, local shops and small online stores. This plugin required plugin WordPress PDF Templates.

For more info about WordPress plugin development, visit The Right Software plugin development services page.
View other WordPress Plugins.
Send your problems to hello@therightsw.com. Dont forget to mention WordPress and WooCommerce versions.

Features:

  1. Category and unit by choosing its quantity and option of packing
  2. The list of item will be saved in PDF for the business offering delivery service under order module
  3. Email Pdf with offering delivery service to admin

Future Updates:

  1. Multilingual support
  2. Online payment
  3. Item search for frontend
  4. User profile to save previous item lists and order history

Features

  • Main support page
  • Searching by Name and Email
  • Item listing
  • Pdf downloading
  • Layout setting in setting page
  • Layout setting in setting page
  • Pagination

Support

Visit https://therightsw.com/ for details and enquiries about DLV.
sections.installation:
1. Upload (Deliverables)folder to the /wp-content/plugins/
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
